body_html:
If you use the Object oriented layers (on master), you can access the variables directly:

conv1 = tf.layers.Conv2d(...)
tf.assign(conv1.kernel, [1,2,3,4])

(also check out init_from_checkpoint)

Would these work in your use case?
body_text:
If you use the Object oriented layers (on master), you can access the variables directly:
conv1 = tf.layers.Conv2d(...)
tf.assign(conv1.kernel, [1,2,3,4]) 

(also check out init_from_checkpoint)
Would these work in your use case?
body:
If you use the Object oriented layers (on master), you can access the variables directly:

```
conv1 = tf.layers.Conv2d(...)
tf.assign(conv1.kernel, [1,2,3,4]) 
```

(also check out `init_from_checkpoint`)

Would these work in your use case?
